generated_text:
{
  "title": "Bacon Wrapped Chicken",
  "serving_size": 4,
  "ingredients": {
    "Chicken": "4 boneless chicken breasts",
    "Bacon": "8 slices bacon",
    "Garlic": "2 cloves garlic, minced",
    "Lemon": "1 lemon, juiced",
    "Black Pepper": "to taste",
    "Olive Oil": "2 tbsp olive oil"
  },
  "instructions": [
    "Preheat the oven to 400°F",
    "Season chicken breasts with minced garlic, lemon juice, black pepper, and olive oil",
    "Wrap each chicken breast with 2 slices of bacon",
    "Place the bacon-wrapped chicken on a baking sheet",
    "Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and bacon is crispy",
    "Serve hot and enjoy!"
  ]
}
